entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
